title: minerjones
author: minerjones
created_time: September 11, 2022, 01:02:11 PMLast edit: September 23, 2022, 12:55:14 PM by minerjones
content: Hello Looking for these 3 specifics on ANY Satori rolls.They all had a small strip of paper inside that had:-Roll Number  (all though, early rolls did not have this)-Chip numbers range-DateBest would be to post data here or a picture of the paper strip/rollJust looking for raw data.....BitFlyer - 1200 (150 x 8 ) made (zuizui)Miss Bitcoin - 100 (zuizui) // 150-200 pcs made (confirmed by Moto, thanks krog  )Zaif- 100 made (zuizui)Quote from: zuizui on September 16, 2022, 01:40:13 AMThe Zaif model Satori coin is limited to 100 copies, and I think the Missbitcoin Satori coin is also 100 copies. I think the bitFlyer Satori coins are 8 colors x 150 coinsThe reason for thise thread/information is to find out:1) The actual number of rolls made by Satori2) The actual number of "other" chips they made (Bitflyer, Zaif, Miss Bitcoin, etc)This would not include the OmiseGo chips they made, as all other followed the same "0.001 btc" load, and the serial numbers fall in-line with the rest of the regular SatoriRight now, looks like the specialty chips were in the 020500-022134 rangeAlso trying to figure out what happened with their roll numbering between July 2017 before the fork and October 2017 after the fork...Seems to be a lot of overlapping roll and chip numbers.. not sure what that is all about

comments.body: I sold the roll I had. But I think I have the slip that was in it if that helps. I have to find it.

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Thanks to everyone who has submitted data so far.We are getting a good view of how the rolls were numbered/dated Here are some pics of the "alternate" Satori chips:Miss Bitcoin / BitFlyer / Zaif / OmiseGo

comments.author: zuizui
comments.body: I'm not sure if this is information for the roll, but I've done some personal research and I'm happy to report that I've found a lot of information.First, of the 50500 Satori coins, there were 3366 coins with a balance of 0.001 BTC or less. This means 3366/47133, which gives an opening rate of about 7.1% for Satori coins.The most expensive Satori coin is No278 with a balance of 1.653 BTC (likely loaded after purchase)The Zaif model Satori coin is limited to 100 copies, and I think the Missbitcoin Satori coin is also 100 copies. I think the bitFlyer Satori coins are 8 colors x 150 coins, but I don't have much information on the serials yet so it's just an estimate.I have data of the balance of all addresses and some special model numbers and I would like to share them.https://56.gigafile.nu/1224-d00e2d90f518eebc6c42368d7397da306No password is set.

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: zuizui on September 16, 2022, 01:40:13 AMI'm not sure if this is information for the roll, but I've done some personal research and I'm happy to report that I've found a lot of information.First, of the 50500 Satori coins, there were 3366 coins with a balance of 0.001 BTC or less. This means 3366/47133, which gives an opening rate of about 7.1% for Satori coins.The most expensive Satori coin is No278 with a balance of 1.653 BTC (likely loaded after purchase)The Zaif model Satori coin is limited to 100 copies, and I think the Missbitcoin Satori coin is also 100 copies. I think the bitFlyer Satori coins are 8 colors x 150 coins, but I don't have much information on the serials yet so it's just an estimate.I have data of the balance of all addresses and some special model numbers and I would like to share them.https://56.gigafile.nu/1224-d00e2d90f518eebc6c42368d7397da306No password is set.Thank you for the information.This greatly helps I checked your chart and added the new info to the OP.

comments.body: You're welcome! I'll be receiving my bitFlyer Satori coins over the weekend and I'll let you know the serial!

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: zuizui on September 16, 2022, 12:25:53 PMサトリコインが届きました、シリアル番号ですが・21019 BLUE・21544 BROWN・21634 BROWN・21780 GREEN以上です、現時点で最も小さいシリアル番号は21019で、最も大きい番号が22075になります。この時点で1000枚以上あるのでサトリコインが1ロール25枚であるなら各色125枚以上ということになりそうです。Quote from: zuizui on September 16, 2022, 12:26:42 PM違います、最も大きい番号は22134ですねSatoricoin has arrived, it's the serial number・21019 BLUE・21544 BROWN・21634 BROWN・21780 GREENSo far, the lowest serial number is 21019and the highest is 22075.At this point, there are more than 1000 coins,so if there are 25 Satoricoins in one roll,it will be more than 125 coins for each color.No, the highest number is 22134Thank you for these messages
